mutants.code:
def choose_event_dates(n, intervals):
    intervals = sorted(intervals, key=lambda x: (x[1], x[0]))
    seen = set()
    chosen_dates = []
    for (li, ri) in intervals:
        cur = li
        while cur not in seen:
            cur += 1
        seen.add(cur)
        chosen_dates.append(cur)
    return chosen_dates

def choose_event_dates(n, intervals):
    intervals = sorted(intervals, key=lambda x: (x[1], x[0]))
    seen = set()
    chosen_dates = []
    for (li, ri) in intervals:
        cur = li
        while cur in seen:
            cur -= 1
        seen.add(cur)
        chosen_dates.append(cur)
    return chosen_dates
